resources.string: No Announcement found. Please click on the refresh button above to refresh the Announcements
Note: if this person is assigned a position either than none, then he/she have the privilege to send announcement, edit, add or delete users etc .To revoke any assigned position, select "None"

I passed through Navasco early enough in its history – from 1966 to 1974 – to recall some exciting moments of its formative years. This means that I met the first batch of students from Folio No 1, who started the school in 1960 when they were writing their external A-Level exams set by the University of London. I spent a total of eight years in Navasco. The one distinguishing trait of Navasco is its meticulous numbering of students who pass through the school, by assigning folio numbers to students alphabetically in year groups, the last folio number on record tells how many students have passed through the school since its inception in 1960. By a student\'s folio number, the year group can immediately be determined, and one can also tell who was in the school earlier than the other.
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

This App is designed to provide important services to support the operation of Nabia04 Association. With members of the association scatted away from each other, the app serves as a tool for bridging the gap by making certain services available to us. The Whatsapp platform has been a very effective tool in terms of communication among members. However, just like all other apps, Whatsapp comes with a few limitations. The Nabia04 App, therefore, presents a few services to complement that of Whatsapp. These services are…

The Database section is the core of the app. Even if the app has nothing to officer, the database section alone is worth using it. This section provides detailed information about each member of the association. The information captured includes personal information, school information (Navasco), work information etc. The app does not only maintain detailed information about members who are alive but also our fallen comrades. It provides a useful way of finding a member base on specific search criteria. Sometimes, one may need help from a colleague of a particular background or from a colleague who works in a particular organization. For example, if you need the help of a police officer in Kumasi metropolitan, the app can give you a list of your colleagues who are police officers there.

The Welfare section handles everything concerning dues and contributions. It gives information on how each person is fairing in terms of dues payment and silver contributions. From the Welfare section, one knows how much he/she has paid so far, number of months paid, number of months owed, percentage contribution, rank and whether you are in good standing or not. The silver contribution sub-section shows the current contribution

This section is a learning section. It is a question-and-answer section. The Nabia04 association is made up of people with different professional backgrounds. Eg; Doctors, Nurses, Lawyers, Teachers etc. With the app, one can tap into the knowledge of these professionals for professional assistance in real-life situation. If you have a professional question, you asked by selecting the right category and typing your question, the question will be delivered to a colleague who’s background is related to the question. This person will then respond to your question.

The Notice board section of the app provides an interactive notification system to keep us informed of important announcements and events. We are notified of important issues on the Whatsapp platform but these notifications or announcements are not grouped and WhatsApp does not remind us of events that are scheduled to occur in the future.\n\nThe announcement section of the app is divided into two categories, General Announcements and Event announcements (Events such as birthdays, weddings, funerals etc). The most important thing about the event notification is that the App automatically schedules an alarm reminder for each event. The Notice board section also shows a list of upcoming birthdays of members. Hence, at any time, we know who’s birthday is due

DATABASE UPDATE\n\nHere you either update a user\'s information or add a new user to the Database. The update is done in three stages; 1: Personal Details, 2: School details and Work details. Apart from folio and username, other information is can be skipped for now. However, please endeavour to provide information for all the field to ensure that Search and Filters work well.
